metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16426 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Endless recursion when handling responses from an IAS-ECC card iniasecc_select_file in libopensc/card-iasecc.c in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards to hang orcrash the opensc library using programs.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
